attributes.action: Make it a law that managers or anyone reviewing employees work must give praise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sick of managers, auditors or authorities who give reviews and checking work being so negative on their staff!
I understand we need to be told what we are doing wrong and were to improve that is a Law itself, however, it wouldn't kill to say 'but your doing a good job keep it up'.
I want it Law that it must be said.
I want it Law that they have to say something good, they do not patronise or condescend.
A bit of positiveness and encouragement goes a long way.
It wouldn't kill to say, you made these mistakes but your doing well seeing as your short staffed etc
People break free from the miserableness, smile and give a positive word!
